short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension Allows quick conversion for any file to PDF from the task bar icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to the extension for PDFmesh. This extension ensures quick and easy functionality by streamlining file-to-PDF conversion straight from the taskbar icon. Users are greeted with a backdrop image on a new tab upon activation.
With only a few clicks, it provides seamless conversion of files in multiple formats to PDF, making it compatible with a wide range of devices.
Users who choose to "Add To Chrome" and activate the pdfmesh.com extension accept the terms and privacy policy found at https://pdfmesh.com/privacy and https://pdfmesh.com/terms.
You can easily uninstall the PDFmesh extension from your browser at any moment by going to http://pdfmesh.com/uninstall. Users can get in touch with developers@pdfmesh.com for more help.
